explains: adj. 无价的；非常有用的；<非正式> 十分有趣的，极为可笑的

sentences.en: They are priceless, unique and irreplaceable.
sentences.cn: 它们是无价的、独一无二的，不可替代的。

sentences.en: Priceless antiques were destroyed in the fire.
sentences.cn: 无价之宝的古董在大火中焚毁。

sentences.en: The priceless treasures had been cast into the Nile.
sentences.cn: 价值连城的珍宝被扔进了尼罗河。
